plant.question: I am green and grow tall. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍌 I am a yummy yellow fruit.
🐒 Monkeys peel me before they eat me.

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves and pretty colors. You can give me to someone you love. What am I?

hints.text: 🥀 I can be red, yellow, pink, or purple.

plant.question: I'm a big plant with a thick trunk and lots of leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍁 My leaves change color in the fall.

plant.question: I am long and green and grow in the ground. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐇 Bugs Bunny loves to eat me.

plant.question: I have prickly needles instead of leaves and stay green all year round. People decorate me for Christmas. What am I?

hints.text: 🎁 Presents are often placed under me.
🎄 I am a type of tree.

plant.question: I am small, green, and cover the ground. It feels soft to walk on me with bare feet. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I'm a good place to have a picnic.

plant.question: I am a tall plant with a hard stalk. You can pop me and eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 When heated, I turn into a fluffy snack.

plant.question: I'm a plant that climbs and has sweet, juicy purple or green fruit growing in bunches. What am I?

hints.text: 🍷 Juice and jelly can be made from me.

plant.question: I am a big, round vegetable with a thick green rind and sweet, juicy red or pink inside. We often eat me in summer. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I am very refreshing on a hot day.
🌱 I have lots of black seeds.
🚚 I can be very big and heavy.

plant.question: I am a tree that gives us something sweet. You can pour me on your pancakes! What am I?

hints.text: 🥞 People tap me to get my sugary sap.
🍂 My leaves have a distinctive shape with points.

animal.question: I say 'meow' and love to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🐾 I have soft fur and four paws.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I'm a good friend. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.

animal.question: I say 'moo' and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I have black and white spots.
🥛 I help make cheese and yogurt.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. What am I?
I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am very big and strong.
🚿 I use my trunk to spray water.

animal.question: I roar and I'm the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🐾 I am a cat, but much bigger.
👑 I am a predator in Africa.

animal.question: I hop around and I love carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🐇 I can be white, brown, or black.
🌱 I eat vegetables and live in burrows.

animal.question: I am black and white and like to eat bamboo. What am I?
I slither on the ground and hiss. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I can be many different colors.
🐁 Some of my species eat mice.

animal.question: I live in the ocean and have eight arms. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I like to live in coral reefs and rocky sea floors.
